item.title: Kennedy grandson Jack Schlossberg announces 2026 congressional bid
item.description: The grandson of John F. Kennedy is running as a Democrat to replace Rep. Jerry Nadler in New York’s 12th Congressional District.

item.title: ‘Not an easy call’: The Democrats who struggled with their shutdown vote
item.description: A significant bloc of Senate Democrats opposed the controversial vote but are glad the stalemate has ended.

item.title: Schumer opposed the shutdown deal. Some Democrats still want him out.
item.description: Some Democrats argue Senate Minority Leader Charles E. Schumer (New York) is not doing enough to stand up to President Donald Trump.

item.title: How federal agents sent by Trump helped slow crime in Memphis
